TextView.android:text:
Meets the developer 
 
 Bobby Putra - bobbyhankam@yahoo.com 
 Dennis Darwis - dennisdarwis@gmail.com 
 

This Project is a university project. But we take it more than just an assignment because 
 we want to learn more what developer need to publish their app. 
 

So please if you interesting in this project or want to give us 
 feedback it will be more than welcome from us to hear what you think about our RPG game app. 
 

You can find out project github here 
 https://github.com/bobjaeger/TheMansion 
 

Thanks :)
